lead_paragraph: The "for sale" sign is up at the Buffalo Bills with the hiring of financial and legal advisers who may begin talking with prospective buyers within the next month.

headline.main: Buffalo Bills Officially for Sale With New Hires
headline.print_headline: Buffalo Bills Officially for Sale With New Hires

snippet: The "for sale" sign is up at the Buffalo Bills with the hiring of financial and legal advisers who may begin talking with prospective buyers within the next month....
